items.title: Words
items.summary: I don't know how you found me. But I am glad…
items.content_html:
I don't know how you found me. But I am glad you did (I think). I don't market but I'm a marketer. I am a lawyer but I haven't practiced in years. I can sell but I never want to. One thing I am certain of is I love to write. Or I used to. Before I almost died.

Have you ever done that? Almost die? It stays with you. In a good way.

I'm a word nerd. I love words. And if you searched for "iterating.com" and found me that way, you're probably a nerd, too, of some sort. Welcome.

Right now, I've reduced my life to two words: Iterating + Actualization.

The process that leads to the infinite.

items.title: This is my blog (I think)
items.summary: What in the heck is going on here? How many words…
items.content_html:
What in the heck is going on here?

How many words can I type?

Testing.

123.

This thing on?

Check.

Jibberish.

More jibberish.

items.title: Hello
items.summary: Is it me you're looking for?
